Daly_City.UCSF School of Medicine: The UCSF School of Medicine, is the medical school of the University of California, San Francisco, United States, and is located in San Francisco. Founded in 1864 by Hugh Toland, it is the oldest medical school in California and the western United States. The school is affiliated with the UCSF Medical Center, which was ranked in 2017 as the #1 hospital in California and the #5 in the United States.
